reviews.customers_say: Customers have mixed opinions about the sweater's fit, with some finding it true to size while others note the length isn't complementary. The material quality receives negative feedback, with several customers describing it as not quality.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cool design!
items.body: The color of this sweater is brighter than I expected. It is a gorgeous red nonetheless! It has a loose fit that im looking for. And the material is thick and warm without being scratchy. The zipper that runs along the body of the sweater lets you customize how you want to wear it, which is a great idea in my opinion! I love that I can customize the style and look of my sweater. Very affordable for something so cool! Read more
items.author: Lizduhlee

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s nothing like the picture!
items.body: I was quite disappointed. The item that arrived looked nothing like the picture. The cotton fabric is EXTREMELY thin and is closer to orange than red. The sweater is more fitted than it appears and does not drape nicely. I tried to zip it up, but there’s a flap of fabric alongside the zipper that gets caught. Returned immediately; the quality is so not worth the price. Read more
items.author: Rebecca J. Mancuso

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars thinner sweater like material
items.body: The style of this sweater is very cute. Fits true to size but the material is very thin. The color is great and it looks good on. Read more
items.author: H.F.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The ribbed knit is lightweight and soft, with a plush texture without being scratchy.
items.body: The ribbed knit is lightweight and soft, with a plush texture that feels warm without being scratchy. The turtleneck is wide, very stetchy and folds easily, offering warmth and comfort without feeling tight or overwhelming. The half-zip adds versatility—wear it zipped up for extra insulation or open for a relaxed look. I ordered a medium, and the fit is loose but not oversized. It drapes loosely over the shoulders and torso, with plenty of room for layering underneath. The sleeves are long and slightly ballooned, tapering into ribbed cuffs that stay in place without squeezing. If you’re petite like me (5'1"), the length hits mid-hip, which works well with leggings or slim jeans. Color-wise, the red is vibrant and true to the online photo. It’s a cheerful, saturated shade that adds a pop of brightness to dreary days. After a gentle wash, the knit held its shape and didn’t pill or fade. The zipper is smooth and sturdy, and the stitching throughout is clean and consistent. One thing to note: this sweater knit is warm and stylish, but not a harsh Montana winter sweater—so you’ll want a coat over it for outdoor wear in colder weather. In short, it’s a cozy, well-made pullover with a long zipper that run easily in a bold style and practical warmth. Great for layering through fall and winter. Read more
items.author: SilverStar

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars The sweater is more tomato red than wine red and the zipper is clunky and cheaply made
items.body: This sweater is one I hoped to love but found to be not particulary comfortable. The zipper and tines are of poor quality and scratch some against your skin. They rub on your neck and it could be better with another shirt underneath. The sweater color leans more toward an orange red rather than a cranberry tone that is pictured and it is thin but oversize, you may want to size down. The sweater also has a very boxy shape. Read more
items.author: J. Sweet

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not quality material
items.author: Loretta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars relaxed, not oversized - but new fave sweater!
items.body: Absolutely LOVE this sweater! I usually wear an XL, but as it's oversized I ordered an L. Could've just gone with XL because it's not really oversized, just a relaxed fit. Still love, & size is fine. The zipper is everything! I get hot so easily, though I enjoy the cozy feel of sweaters, so I can just use that zipper to cool off a bit! I like the look of a turtle neck, but not the feel, so I can unzip & have it fold down, which is very cute. Washes like a dream - even put into dryer briefly to fluff it up, though I don't recommend for more than a couple of mins... BUT that zipper will snag stuff, including this guy, so be sure it's closed completely, & I recommend a net bag. Color is true to pic, at least on my monitor, it's soft but not fluffy, & looks much more expensive than it is. Heartily recommend! Read more
items.author: MJ-SF

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but short lenght
items.body: Cute, very light weight. Too short, length not complementary, if you’re petite it probably works. Machine wash and lay flat for best care but washes nicely on delicate Read more
items.author: A Jordan

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
